verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said ( The Second Plague: Frogs) יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses, בֹּ֖א <WH935> bō “ Go אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh Pharaoh וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> wə·’ā·mar·tā and tell him that אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> ’ê·lāw ... כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> kōh this is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> šal·laḥ go, אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> ‘am·mî ‘ Let My people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <WH5647> wə·ya·‘aḇ·ḏu·nî so that they may worship Me.

וְאִם־ <WH518> wə·’im- But if מָאֵ֥ן <WH3986> mā·’ên refuse אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> ’at·tāh you לְשַׁלֵּ֑חַ <WH7971> lə·šal·lê·aḥ to let them go, הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin·nêh - אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> ’ā·nō·ḵî I נֹגֵ֛ף <WH5062> nō·ḡêp̄ will plague אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- vvv גְּבוּלְךָ֖ <WH1366> gə·ḇū·lə·ḵā your whole country בַּֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃ <WH6854> baṣ·p̄ar·də·‘îm with frogs.

וְשָׁרַ֣ץ <WH8317> wə·šā·raṣ will teem הַיְאֹר֮ <WH2975> hay·’ōr The Nile צְפַרְדְּעִים֒ <WH6854> ṣə·p̄ar·də·‘îm with frogs, וְעָלוּ֙ <WH5927> wə·‘ā·lū and they will come וּבָ֣אוּ <WH935> ū·ḇā·’ū vvv בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> bə·ḇê·ṯe·ḵā into your palace וּבַחֲדַ֥ר <WH2315> ū·ḇa·ḥă·ḏar and up to your bedroom מִשְׁכָּבְךָ֖ <WH4904> miš·kā·ḇə·ḵā ... וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- and onto מִטָּתֶ֑ךָ <WH4296> miṭ·ṭā·ṯe·ḵā your bed, וּבְבֵ֤ית <WH1004> ū·ḇə·ḇêṯ into the houses עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> ‘ă·ḇā·ḏe·ḵā of your officials וּבְעַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> ū·ḇə·‘am·me·ḵā and your people, וּבְתַנּוּרֶ֖יךָ <WH8574> ū·ḇə·ṯan·nū·re·ḵā and into your ovens וּבְמִשְׁאֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4863> ū·ḇə·miš·’ă·rō·w·ṯe·ḵā and kneading bowls.

וּבְכָ֥ה Conj-w│Prep ( ū·ḇə·ḵāh) on you וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֖ 5971 Conj-w, Prep-b│N-msc│2ms ( ū·ḇə·‘am·mə·ḵā) and your people וּבְכָל־ 3605 Conj-w, Prep-b│N-msc ( ū·ḇə·ḵāl) and all עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ 5650 N-mpc│2ms ( ‘ă·ḇā·ḏe·ḵā) your officials. ’” יַעֲל֖וּ 5927 V-Qal-Imperf-3mp ( ya·‘ă·lū) will come up הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃ 6854 Art│N-fp ( haṣ·p̄ar·də·‘îm) The frogs

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah·weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses, אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> ’ĕ·mōr “ Tell אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- ... אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron, נְטֵ֤ה <WH5186> nə·ṭêh ‘ Stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יָדְךָ֙ <WH3027> yā·ḏə·ḵā your hand בְּמַטֶּ֔ךָ <WH4294> bə·maṭ·ṭe·ḵā with your staff עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- over הַ֨נְּהָרֹ֔ת <WH5104> han·nə·hā·rōṯ the rivers עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- - הַיְאֹרִ֖ים <WH2975> hay·’ō·rîm and canals וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- ... הָאֲגַמִּ֑ים <WH98> hā·’ă·ḡam·mîm and ponds, וְהַ֥עַל <WH5927> wə·ha·‘al to come up onto אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <WH6854> haṣ·p̄ar·də·‘îm and cause the frogs עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- ... אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yim of Egypt. ’”

וַיֵּ֤ט <WH5186> way·yêṭ stretched out אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn So Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> yā·ḏōw his hand עַ֖ל <WH5921> ‘al over מֵימֵ֣י <WH4325> mê·mê the waters מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yim of Egypt, וַתַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> wat·ta·‘al came up הַצְּפַרְדֵּ֔עַ <WH6854> haṣ·ṣə·p̄ar·dê·a‘ and the frogs וַתְּכַ֖ס <WH3680> wat·tə·ḵas and covered אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yim of Egypt.

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> way·ya·‘ă·śū- did כֵ֥ן <WH3651> ḵên the same thing הַֽחֲרְטֻמִּ֖ים <WH2748> ha·ḥăr·ṭum·mîm But the magicians בְּלָטֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3909> bə·lā·ṭê·hem by their magic arts, וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> way·ya·‘ă·lū up אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <WH6854> haṣ·p̄ar·də·‘îm and they also brought frogs עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- onto אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yim of Egypt.

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā summoned פַרְעֹ֜ה <WH6547> p̄ar·‘ōh Pharaoh לְמֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> lə·mō·šeh Moses וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> ū·lə·’a·hă·rōn and Aaron וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer and said, הַעְתִּ֣ירוּ <WH6279> ha‘·tî·rū “ Pray אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD וְיָסֵר֙ <WH5493> wə·yā·sêr to take הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <WH6854> haṣ·p̄ar·də·‘îm the frogs מִמֶּ֖נִּי <WH4480> mim·men·nî away from me וּמֵֽעַמִּ֑י <WH5971> ū·mê·‘am·mî and my people. וַאֲשַׁלְּחָה֙ <WH7971> wa·’ă·šal·lə·ḥāh go, אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām Then I will let your people וְיִזְבְּח֖וּ <WH2076> wə·yiz·bə·ḥū that they may sacrifice לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD. ”

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses לְפַרְעֹה֮ <WH6547> lə·p̄ar·‘ōh to Pharaoh, הִתְפָּאֵ֣ר <WH6286> hiṯ·pā·’êr “ You may have the honor עָלַי֒ <WH5921> ‘ā·lay over me. לְמָתַ֣י׀ <WH4970> lə·mā·ṯay When אַעְתִּ֣יר <WH6279> ’a‘·tîr shall I pray לְךָ֗ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) for you וְלַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ 5650 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-mpc│2ms ( wə·la·‘ă·ḇā·ḏe·ḵā) and your officials וּֽלְעַמְּךָ֔ 5971 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-msc│2ms ( ū·lə·‘am·mə·ḵā) and your people לְהַכְרִית֙ 3772 Prep-l│V-Hifil-Inf ( lə·haḵ·rîṯ) may be taken away הַֽצֲפַרְדְּעִ֔ים 6854 Art│N-fp ( ha·ṣă·p̄ar·də·‘îm) that the frogs מִמְּךָ֖ 4480 Prep│2ms ( mim·mə·ḵā) from וּמִבָּתֶּ֑יךָ 1004 Conj-w, Prep-m│N-mpc│2ms ( ū·mib·bāt·te·ḵā) you and your houses? ” רַ֥ק 7535 Adv ( raq) ... בַּיְאֹ֖ר 2975 Prep-b, Art│N-proper-fs ( bay·’ōr) in the Nile ) תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃ 7604 V-Nifal-Imperf-3fp ( tiš·šā·’ar·nāh) ( except for those

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer [Pharaoh] answered. לְמָחָ֑ר <WH4279> lə·mā·ḥār “ Tomorrow, ” וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer Moses replied, כִּדְבָ֣רְךָ֔ <WH1697> kiḏ·ḇā·rə·ḵā “ [May it be] as you say, ” לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> lə·ma·‘an “ so that תֵּדַ֔ע <WH3045> tê·ḏa‘ you may know כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- that אֵ֖ין <WH369> ’ên there is no one כַּיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh like the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê·nū our God.

וְסָר֣וּ <WH5493> wə·sā·rū will depart הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֗ים <WH6854> haṣ·p̄ar·də·‘îm The frogs מִמְּךָ֙ <WH4480> mim·mə·ḵā from you וּמִבָּ֣תֶּ֔יךָ <WH1004> ū·mib·bāt·te·ḵā and your houses וּמֵעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> ū·mê·‘ă·ḇā·ḏe·ḵā and your officials וּמֵעַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> ū·mê·‘am·me·ḵā and your people; רַ֥ק <WH7535> raq only בַּיְאֹ֖ר <WH2975> bay·’ōr in the Nile. ” תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃ <WH7604> tiš·šā·’ar·nāh they will remain

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> way·yê·ṣê had left מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mō·šeh After Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> wə·’a·hă·rōn and Aaron מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> mê·‘im ... פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh Pharaoh, וַיִּצְעַ֤ק <WH6817> way·yiṣ·‘aq for help מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- cried out to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> də·ḇar with הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <WH6854> haṣ·p̄ar·də·‘îm the frogs אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- that שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> śām He had brought לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> lə·p̄ar·‘ōh against Pharaoh.

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> way·ya·‘aś did יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh And the LORD כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> kiḏ·ḇar requested, מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mō·šeh as Moses וַיָּמֻ֙תוּ֙ <WH4191> way·yā·mu·ṯū died. הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <WH6854> haṣ·p̄ar·də·‘îm and the frogs מִן־ <WH4480> min- in הַבָּתִּ֥ים <WH1004> hab·bāt·tîm the houses, מִן־ <WH4480> min- ... הַחֲצֵרֹ֖ת <WH2691> ha·ḥă·ṣê·rōṯ the courtyards, וּמִן־ <WH4480> ū·min- ... הַשָּׂדֹֽת׃ <WH7704> haś·śā·ḏōṯ and the fields

וַיִּצְבְּר֥וּ <WH6651> way·yiṣ·bə·rū They were piled אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> ’ō·ṯām ... חֳמָרִ֣ם <WH2563> ḥo·mā·rim into countless heaps חֳמָרִ֑ם <WH2563> ḥo·mā·rim ..., וַתִּבְאַ֖שׁ <WH887> wat·tiḇ·’aš and there was a terrible stench הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ in the land.

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> way·yar saw that פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh When Pharaoh כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî ... הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> hā·yə·ṯāh there was הָֽרְוָחָ֔ה <WH7309> hā·rə·wā·ḥāh relief, however, וְהַכְבֵּד֙ <WH3513> wə·haḵ·bêḏ he hardened ( Or made heavy; also in verse 32) אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> lib·bōw his heart וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> wə·lō and would not שָׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> šā·ma‘ listen אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> ’ă·lê·hem to [Moses and Aaron], כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka·’ă·šer just as דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib·ber had said. יְהוָֽה׃ס <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said ( The Third Plague: Gnats) יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah·weh Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses, אֱמֹר֙ <WH559> ’ĕ·mōr “ Tell אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- ... אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron, נְטֵ֣ה <WH5186> nə·ṭêh ‘ Stretch out אֶֽת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - מַטְּךָ֔ <WH4294> maṭ·ṭə·ḵā your staff וְהַ֖ךְ <WH5221> wə·haḵ and strike אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עֲפַ֣ר <WH6083> ‘ă·p̄ar the dust הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ of the earth, וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> wə·hā·yāh that it may turn into לְכִנִּ֖ם <WH3654> lə·ḵin·nim swarms of gnats בְּכָל־ <WH3605> bə·ḵāl throughout אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yim of Egypt. ’”
